summary.para: An application-defined callback method used for raw image parameter change notifications.

param.name: NotificationMask
param.para: A set of IWICDevelopRawNotificationCallback Constants parameter notification flags.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Exposes a callback method for raw image change nofications.
